cp2Skills.name: Friends in Low Places
cp2Skills.minDescription:
Removes |cffffff1000|r gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.

You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than |cffffff1000|r gold.
cp2Skills.maxDescription:
Removes |cffffff1000|r gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.

You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than |cffffff1000|r gold.

cp2Skills.minDescription: Escaping from a Guard wipes |cffffff25|r% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.
cp2Skills.maxDescription: Escaping from a Guard wipes |cffffff25|r% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.

cp2Skills.name: Shadowstrike
